Meet the 2017 Admin Team!

Camp Director

Karlina Young

Karlina is returning after 4 years away and can't wait for her 8th summer at Goshen. She was previously Lenhok'sin's Program Director, Commissioner and worked at the Caving and Rock Climbing outposts. She loves living out of a backpack and exploring the world.
